Lines: This will be our first battle in such
DeepL_mtl: This is the first time I've seen a battle in a densely built-up urban area.

Lines: Although there are no people, the town seems to
have remained almost in its original form.
We'll have to use the building as cover during fight.
DeepL_mtl: There are no people, but the town seems to have retained most of its original form.
It looks like we will have to use the building as a shield and fight it well.

Lines: Even a tank can be quite a threat in a area
DeepL_mtl: In a field where action is restricted, even tanks are a pretty good threat.

Lines: Mobile warfare is what MS excels at.
Take that away, and its just a big target.
DeepL_mtl: MSs are all about maneuverability, and if you can't take advantage of that, you're just a big target, aren't you?

Lines: We are here to defend Gun Tanks, but they are spread all over
our assigned area. We will have to split in two groups to cover
them. Lilly, you and Dennis will be one group, I'll go alone.
DeepL_mtl: The gun tanks are defensive targets, but they are deployed over a fairly wide area, so from our jurisdiction, we have to split up to follow them.
I'll have Lil and Dennis team up and I'll act alone.

Lines: I don't mind if I'm alone...
No, I think the captain would be more suitable.
DeepL_mtl: I don't mind if I go it alone...
No, a captain would be more appropriate.
